featured.text: He then moved to New York City, where he worked as a freelance illustrator with Harper’s Weekly, a popular magazine of the time, and began painting.

definition.zh_def: 演奏豎琴的人；豎琴製造者。
definition.en_def: A person who plays the harp; a maker of harps.
definition.example: The talented harper captivated the audience with her beautiful melodies.
